text: @racheljulie @NYGovCuomo https://t.co/XG1z6abZFR I recognize that it’s a rain poncho with a baseball emblem but you are in crisis/ contingency mode and that poncho is far less permeable than the typical gown/garment issued for droplet splatter protection in a clinical setting. Thank you for all you do.
